name: Text as Data
body:
**Neal Caren** - University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill

**Data collection**
* Scraping Web Pages
    * [Grabbing lacrosse scores](http://nealcaren.github.io/text-as-data/html/scraping_lax.html)
* Using APIs
     * [Sushi Bars and Buffets: Measuring local culture with the Yelp API](http://nealcaren.github.io/text-as-data/html/yelp_api.html)

**Analysis**
* Word Frequencies
     * [How the New York Times writes about men and women]
(http://nealcaren.github.io/text-as-data/html/times_gender.html)


**Other**
* [Generating field hockey power ratings](http://nealcaren.github.io/text-as-data/html/field_hockey.html)
